name: Will's Adventure
description:
"Will's Adventure" is a solo adventure game with the themes of escape game and imagination.

The game is in french.

 

Will is a captain pirate who is looking for his lost chocolate coins which is in magical and colored boxes on his own ship. 

He must bring himself magical pencils which will allow his saber to cut them. Once he gets his coins back, all he has to do is get his pig to guard it ! 

What Will doesn't know (or maybe he does) is that he's just the result of a child's overflowing imagination !


  • Find magical pencils in your ship
  •  Color your saber to break colored boxes
  • Find chocolate coins and give them to your piggy bank  

  • Three rebus to resolve
  • Three pencils to find
  • Three chocolate coins to find
  • Places to search

A Beautiful World : 
You are in a childlike world full of toys, imagination makes you live your adventure...

Artistic Piracy :
Find pencils and color your pirate saber.
